item.title: Public Safety News Analysis (Engineering)
item.description: This post describes the technical implementation of the public safety news analysis. Update: I’ve implemented a LOT more and need to update the writeup! Training Data News articles: I labeled an independent sample to train each task. Chicago streets network: I enumerated all blocks and intersections and spatially joined these with community area boundaries. I used these {location -> community area} mappings as synthetic data to train the classifier. Architecture Article Classifier: This is an off-the-shelf uninitialized binary text classification model.
